summary: I have…. a question for Els and Eraser! Okay, there might not be but… I was wondering, did Sho ever have any hobbies that he...
question: I have…. a question for Els and Eraser! Okay, there might not be but… I was wondering, did Sho ever have any hobbies that he initially didn’t mention to Elly, but once he was comfortable he did share? Like, was there ever anything he was slightly embarrassed about or maybe thought might make him seem dull and boring… or for any other reason really!
answer:
So… this may not come as a surprise. But one day I was digging around in the closet and found this box allll the way in the back.

He collects cat toys.

But he doesn’t own a single cat! Some of these were still in the original wrappers -

WHAT DID I TELL YOU ABOUT THIS CHES

Ooops

This now comes with ficlet! lol

https://archiveofourown.org/works/18010499

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: Match up? I'm a 5'5, 15yo female with long dark brown hair. Panromantic ace. More masculine. Can't see, my glasses suck....
question: Match up? I'm a 5'5, 15yo female with long dark brown hair. Panromantic ace. More masculine. Can't see, my glasses suck. Navajo/Puerto Rican loser (pale skinned). Sad and tired is my default setting. Every now and then I'll act like a big, loud spaz. Not much of a talker, too awkward to be one (kind of lonely because of it). Terrible paranoia, especially at night. I listen to music a lot cause it fuels my escapism. I like weight lifting, singing, videogames and learning things about my cultures.
answer:
I would match you up with Jirou! Jirou isn’t someone who needs someone to talk all the time so she’s totally fine if you aren’t the most talkative but when you do talk Jirou swoons over how much she loves your voice! She would love to listen to music with you, maybe sing and write a few songs together as well! Jirou is always there if you need some comfort or reassure you, she’ll sit by your side and offer a hug or two and play your favorite songs in the background. If you ever have nightmares and have paranoia, you can always wake her up to talk if you needed too. Jirou likes to sit down and play video games with you, it’s something where you two can relax and laugh!


I hope you enjoyed, and honey if you ever need to talk feel free to message me! I’m always happy to just listen if you want me too. Also can recommend some great bands for you! Have a great day!

Ophelia

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: Nejire at the beach with her male s/o
question: Nejire at the beach with her male s/o
answer:
-Nejire is the type that likes to just walk hand and hand with her boyfriend and admiring the waves, maybe take a few cute pictures as well.

-She loves to pick up shells and admire them, maybe list off a few interesting facts about certain shells and make a little necklace for you.

-If you buy ice cream she always tries to take a bite out of your ice cream instead of hers.

-You and Nejire attempt to build the best sandcastle ever, like it has a moat, multiple towers, and decorations in it. You two use little shells to represent mini-yous in your glorious sand castle.

-She definitely packs a lunch for a nice picnic by the waves, it all tasted so great until the sandwiches actually got sand in it.

-If you splash Nejire with water, she just laughs before doing a full-on attack of splashes of water at you. You two just become absolutely drenched and laugh.

-She loves when the sunsets and she just cuddles up next to her boyfriend’s chest.



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia

tags: I mean deku as a villain is terrifying enough
but imagine uraraka with any actual training in martial arts
I guess? like not really but
summary: I feel like as a fandom we’re sleeping on just how terrifying Uraraka would be as a villain.  Maybe it’s just because she’s...
body:
I feel like as a fandom we’re sleeping on just how terrifying Uraraka would be as a villain.  Maybe it’s just because she’s super bubbly all the time, but people seem to forget how badass she is?

Like, sure, she’s a relatively normal teenager aside from being in the hero course, but like… Would you want to fight her?  Do you really wanna mess with this girl?

Her as a villain would be actually straight-up terrifying.  She could send you flying into the sun if she felt like it.  After a week training with Gunhead, she learned how to take down somebody with a knife.  ONE WEEK.

Do you really wanna go up against that girl if she had actual martial arts training?

In conclusion, by the time Uravity becomes an actual hero, she’ll be feared by villains all over.  And thank goodness she’s on the hero side?  She’s a high schooler and she could’ve demolished Bakugo easily with an environment slightly more in her favor.

reblog.comment:
I feel like as a fandom we’re sleeping on just how terrifying Uraraka would be as a villain.  Maybe it’s just because she’s super bubbly all the time, but people seem to forget how badass she is?

Like, sure, she’s a relatively normal teenager aside from being in the hero course, but like… Would you want to fight her?  Do you really wanna mess with this girl?

Her as a villain would be actually straight-up terrifying.  She could send you flying into the sun if she felt like it.  After a week training with Gunhead, she learned how to take down somebody with a knife.  ONE WEEK.

Do you really wanna go up against that girl if she had actual martial arts training?

In conclusion, by the time Uravity becomes an actual hero, she’ll be feared by villains all over.  And thank goodness she’s on the hero side?  She’s a high schooler and she could’ve demolished Bakugo easily with an environment slightly more in her favor.

trail.content_raw:
I feel like as a fandom we’re sleeping on just how terrifying Uraraka would be as a villain.  Maybe it’s just because she’s super bubbly all the time, but people seem to forget how badass she is?

Like, sure, she’s a relatively normal teenager aside from being in the hero course, but like… Would you want to fight her?  Do you really wanna mess with this girl?

Her as a villain would be actually straight-up terrifying.  She could send you flying into the sun if she felt like it.  After a week training with Gunhead, she learned how to take down somebody with a knife.  ONE WEEK.

Do you really wanna go up against that girl if she had actual martial arts training?

In conclusion, by the time Uravity becomes an actual hero, she’ll be feared by villains all over.  And thank goodness she’s on the hero side?  She’s a high schooler and she could’ve demolished Bakugo easily with an environment slightly more in her favor.

Like, sure, she’s a relatively normal teenager aside from being in the hero course, but like… Would you want to fight her?  Do you really wanna mess with this girl?

Her as a villain would be actually straight-up terrifying.  She could send you flying into the sun if she felt like it.  After a week training with Gunhead, she learned how to take down somebody with a knife.  ONE WEEK.

Do you really wanna go up against that girl if she had actual martial arts training?
